Moderate Quality Check Tool: Quality Check Tool for Energy Performance Certificates (EPCs)
app_description: The purpose of this application is to provide a clear and concise review of the anomalies found, in order to facilitate their review and correction prior to uploading the certificate to the registry. This application generates a report detailing the inconsistencies identified in the energy certificate analysis. There are two types of incidents:
error_description: parameters that must be corrected in any case. They include form errors, missing mandatory fields that prevent uploading the certificate to the registry, or non-compliance with deadlines set by regulations.
suspected_error_description: parameters whose values deviate from expected logical limits. Although they are not considered definitive errors, there is a high probability that they are, so they require additional review. These issues are only checked on EPCs of
drag_drop_xml: Drag and drop the Energy Efficiency Certificate in XML format here
